root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 8-8-1, translated into en
root.data:
• ILO Guidebook - Decent Work and the Sustainable Development Goals: A Guidebook on SDG Labour Market Indicators (https://www.ilo.org/global/statistics-and-databases/publications/WCMS_647109/lang--en/index.htm)
  • ILOSTAT database: https://ilostat.ilo.org
  • ILOSTAT Metadata – Indicator Descriptions (https://ilostat.ilo.org/resources/concepts-and-definitions/description-occupational-injuries/)
  • Decent Work Indicators Manual: https://www.ilo.org/integration/resources/pubs/WCMS_229374/lang--en/index.htm
  • Resolution concerning statistics of occupational injuries (resulting from occupational accidents) adopted by the 16th ICLS in 1998: https://www.ilo.org/global/statistics-and-databases/standards-and-guidelines/resolutions-adopted-by-international-conferences-of-labour-statisticians/WCMS_087528/lang--en/index.htm
